Effective Date of Entitlement Versus Effective Date of Payment
Under
38 CFR 3.31
, VA may not pay monetary benefits based on an initial or supplemental award of compensation, pension, or Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) for any period prior to the first day of the calendar month following the month in which the beneficiary became entitled to the benefit.

.
